oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Honorable discharge papers of Pvt. James W. Ivey, wagoner and chauffeur
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The honorable discharge certificate of James Wilson Ivey with his enlistment record on the reverse side. Ivey served from Aprfil 12, 1917 to June 9, 1919 in Co. D, 20th Inf. Regt. as a wagoner. He later enlisted in the Army Air Service as a chauffeur. After the war, he drove a fire truck in Memphis, and died of appendecitis at the age of 24.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
